TrainingDetails.Abstract: This is the front page to any section on the website. It can contain content and HTML with its body.
TrainingDetails.BodyCopy:
Required Information:
You need to know how to upload photos into the Ingeniux CMS
Required Elements on this page

(These elements are needed to save the page): 

  • Title
  • Abstract

 

Title

Here you need to enter the title of the site. It will be placed in the header of the page.

Abstract

A summary of the site

SEO Group

Browser Bar Title

Title of the page that will go in the browser bar

No Follow

  Search engines will not index the links on this page.

No Index

Search engines will not index the links on this page AND this page will not be either.

NO ODP

  This page will not be indexed by the ODP search engine. Please see this link for more information about ODP.

Priority

  Please do not adjust this setting

Related Links

The organization you work for should also have its won related links section. You will need to choose that one.

Tab Links

There are three link choices when you are selecting a link to post in the menu.

1. Internal Link- This is a link within the school's site. You will need to know the name of the page to put it here

Page- Type in the name of the page that you want to put in here a drop down will appear. Please select the correct page you want to display.

2. External Link- This is a link to a page outside of the school's site. Paste the URL of the page you want to link to here.

URL- Copy the URL of the website you want to like to here

3. Document Link- This is a link to a document that has been placed on the site. Please see the instructions on how to do that before selecting the link.

Document- Type the name of your document here. Then click browse. From here navigate to the location of your document and click ok when down

 

Body Copy

This is where your site will go.

Image Column

Images

Width: 159px

  1. Click on browse on the right of the box.
  2. Find your image within the structure
  3. Click ok
  4. Add alt text in the box provided. This text should be descriptive of the image you are adding to the page.
Site Control
You will need to choose the site control that is related to your department.
